message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This allows us to share the funds while accounting for the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think I can do better than 25% for me. Let's try this 80/20 split.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a 61.25/38.75 split. This aims to provide a fair distribution while taking into account the inflation affecting my share more significantly.
Let's meet in the middle and divide the money evenly, before the value of Alice's share decreases further.
